title: "The Al Davis All-Stars of the Draft," Cleveland's Fresh Faces, and Pittsburgh Lands a New QB | GM Street (Ep. 261)
description:
The Ringer’s Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier sit down to discuss the Browns' first two picks (03:00), Mason Rudolph ending up on the Steelers (14:15), and "The Al Davis All-Stars of the Draft" (27:30). They wrap up the show by going through some teams' projected win totals from Las Vegas (41:00).



      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
